description: Genocider Shou is http://anidb.net/ch51215 [Fukawa Touko]`s murderous and sadistic alternate personality. Her appearance is generally the same as Touko`s, since they share the same body. However, some features differ: her eyes become red, and she wears a wild facial expression. She has a long tongue that hangs out of her mouth over her sharp teeth.
name: Genocider Shou
